Show Spotlight Products and Featured Products

Prominently showcase certain products on your Home page. For example, maybe you have certain products that are popular and you want to encourage more sales. You can display those products immediately when buyers reach your storefront.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS

Salesforce Compatibility

Salesforce Classic (not available in all orgs) and Lightning Experience for Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.




B2B Commerce Compatibility

B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’20 (version 4.12)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10)
B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9)


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create CC Featured Products records:	Create on CC Featured Products
USER EXPERIENCE COMPATIBILITY
Interface	Bootstrap 3 or classic
Pages	Home page only
Page layouts	Main column only of any one-, two-, or three-column layout
User visibility	Logged-in users and guest users (depending on your storefront's guest user access)

You can add both Spotlight Products (1) and Featured Products (2). If you create both, the Spotlight Products widget displays first. Optionally, you can hide either widget even if your org has the required records created.

To set up the Spotlight Products or Featured Products widgets on your storefront:

Create a CC Featured Product record.
On the CC Featured Products tab in your org, click New.
For Product Item, search for the CC Product record that you want to showcase.
For Featured Product Name, enter an internal name for the record.
NOTE This value isn't displayed on the storefront. The product name shown is the name of the referenced CC Product record.
For Type, select Spotlight or Featured, depending on where you want the product to display.
For Storefront, add at least one storefront to the Chosen column.
Select Enabled.
Enter a Sequence value.
NOTE To determine the order of multiple spotlight or featured products, B2B Commerce for Visualforce compares the Sequence values of all CC Featured Products with the same Type value. For example, let’s say that you have two featured products. One featured product has a sequence of 100, and the other has a sequence of 200. The featured product with the value 100 displays first, and the featured product with the value 200 displays second.
To use the product's existing short description in the Spotlight Products or Featured Products, leave the Description RT blank. To override the product's existing short description with custom text, enter the text in Description RT.
Save your changes.
Enable the Spotlight Products widget.
On the CC Admin tab in your org, select your storefront (1).
In the Storefront Settings menu, select Configuration Settings (2).
From the Module picklist, select Spotlight (3).
Find the Enabled configuration (4), and find its value (5).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Spotlight
Configuration	Enabled
Page	HP
Value	TRUE
Configure the Featured Products widget.
From the Module picklist, select Featured Products (6).
To enable the Spotlight Products widget, find the Enabled configuration (7), and find its value (8).
TIP
If the value is FALSE, click Override in the Action column. Enter TRUE for Value, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Featured Products
Configuration	Enabled
Page	HP
Value	TRUE
To configure the number of columns to use for showing products in the Featured Products widget, find the Number of Columns configuration (9) and find its value (10).
TIP
The default value, 2, specifies that the Featured Spotlights widget uses two columns. If you're satisfied with this value, continue to the next step.
To change the current value, click Override in the Action column. Enter one of the following supported values, and click Create.
If the configuration doesn't exist, click New , enter the following values in the New Page Setting window, and click Create.
FIELD	VALUE
Module	Featured Products
Configuration	Number of Columns
Page	HP
Value	1, 2, 3, or 4
Build and activate a new configuration cache.
Localize Spotlight Products and Featured Products for a Translated Storefront
If your storefront supports more than one locale, localize your spotlight or featured product records for each of your supported languages.
